testcase.name: Unknown Aspect Model
testcase.description: If the processing software does not recognise the aspect model identified by the value of the @aspectModel attribute then the error MUST be thrown

variation.name: Erroneous aspect-model due to case mismatch
variation.description: The variable set of a variable-set resource with an @aspectModel attribute NoN-dImEnSiOnAl, showing that case-sensitive matching is used.

variation.name: Erroneous aspect-model due to unexpected token
variation.description: The variable set of a variable-set resource with an @aspectModel attribute foobar, that is not part of the current spec.
